item.title: 众议院共和党人公布了 2021 年 1 月 6 日美国国会大厦遇袭事件的 5000 小时监控录像，但议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）宣布，录像中的个人面孔将不再模糊。
item.description:
House Republicans released 5,000 hours more of security footage from the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol — but Speaker Mike Johnson announced that the faces of individuals in the footage will no longer be blurred. https://t.co/HofW3DrYFn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 本周，美国高级交通官员会见了阿拉巴马州黑人居民，他们声称自己家附近的高速公路拓宽项目导致洪水不断，但这些居民表示，联邦层面仍需采取更多行动。
item.description:
Senior U.S. transportation officials met with Black Alabama residents this week over claims that a highway widening project near their homes caused repeated flooding — but those residents say that more action is still needed at the federal level. https://t.co/E87rDIZVL1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 爆料：一名因以利亚-麦克莱恩（Elijah McClain）之死而被定罪的医护人员被判处五年监禁。彼得-西丘尼耶克（Peter Cichuniec）被指控在2019年8月24日与警方遭遇后，使用过量氯胺酮镇静麦克莱恩。
item.description:
BREAKING: A paramedic convicted in the death of Elijah McClain has been sentenced to five years in prison.

Peter Cichuniec was accused of administering an excessive amount of ketamine to sedate McClain after an encounter with police on Aug. 24, 2019. https://t.co/T8YcBIZadR pic.twitter.com/CXqRS6hjUa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 减少工作时间是否能提高公司的整体生产率？在 61 家公司选择参与每周四天工作制试点研究一年后，89% 的公司选择保留这一结构。
item.description:
Do fewer working hours boost a company's overall productivity?

One year after 61 companies opted to participate in a four-day week pilot study, 89% of the companies are opting to keep the structure in place. https://t.co/R7lqayo1vs pic.twitter.com/YMvRtb8Rln

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.description:
A 68-year-old man has been charged with two counts of murder and one count of assault after he shot four people — two of whom died — during an eviction at a home in Missouri, according to Jackson County Prosecutor Jean Peters Baker. https://t.co/wKJkkjEvLg

item.title: 最新消息：拜登总统签署了一项短期支出措施，使一组联邦机构和另一组联邦机构分别在 3 月 8 日和 3 月 22 日之前继续运作，从而正式避免了本将于周日开始的政府部分停摆。
item.description:
